title: Guessing Game
description: A simple guessing game that randomly selects a keyboard letter, then reads the player's inputs to determine correct guesses.

title: Crystal Gem Game
description: A simple guessing game that randomly reassigns HTML attribute values and selects a target value. The player must perform simple arithmetic to press the buttons with the correct numbers in order to match the target value.

title: Star Wars Trivia Game
description: A timed Trivia game based on the Star Wars property. Utilizes timeout scripts to dynamically update the webpage without requiring a refresh.

title: Animated Gif Generator
description: An exercise in sampling from extenal APIs. Pulls a random assortment of animaged gifs from the Giphy API, and allows the user to insert custom search buttons that dynamically update on the page.

title: Train Timer
description: A train scheduling app utilizing Google Firebase and Moment.JS to create and maintain a live-update database of trains and calculate their arrival times.

title: LIRI
description: An Axios and Node.JS terminal program that uses external APIs (Spotify and OMDB) to read user input and display search results in the console.

title: Bamazon
description: A MySQL and Node.JS terminal program that hosts a database of fictional products, then uses conditional logic and user inputs to guide the user through a product purchase flow.

title: Character Clicker Memory Game
description: A React.JS game program that dynamically generates, updates and randomizes an array of character cards, remembers the list of selected characters, and tasks the player with clicking on unique characters without repeating past selections.
